author: BounceZap

sections.description:
Our software allows you to easily create your own lightbox popups within minutes. Choose from various styles to try and capture abandoning website visitors and present them with offers before they leave.

Our behaviour analysis technology predicts the exact moment visitors are about to leave your website and presents them with custom messages based on rules you have configured. Target them based on variables such as time, page visited, position on page and much much more. Wouldn’t it be nice to have a reliable tool that can capture more visitors and help your business grow?

Basic features:

  • Easily Create Popups
  • Full access 14 day free trial – from $9.00 per month thereafter
  • Works on any platform or website
  • Built-in analytics
  • Collect and export lead data easily
  • Easy, non-technical setup and award winning support

Advanced features:

  • Target by page visited
  • Target based on time
  • Target based on position on page
  • SEO and speed tested
  • Facebook targeting ready

Try our free, no-obligation 14-day trial, prices start from as little as $9.00 per month thereafter. For further details visit www.bouncezap.com
See more at Bouncezap.com
sections.installation:
1. Install Bouncezap either via the WordPress.org plugin, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Register on www.bouncezap.com for a free trial (no credit card required) and obtain your Client ID.
  4. Set you Client ID in the WordPress plugin.
  5. Set up your campaigns within the easy to use Bouncezap platform: www.bouncezap.com
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install Bouncezap either via the WordPress.org plugin, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Register on www.bouncezap.com for a free trial (no credit card required) and obtain your Client ID.
  4. Set you Client ID in the WordPress plugin.
  5. Set up your campaigns within the easy to use Bouncezap platform: www.bouncezap.com

Does this plugin affect SEO?

No – it has no affect and is totally safe.

Do I need coding skills to use this?

No it is easy for anyone to use our software.

Is it free?

We offer a 14 day free trial, our prices start at a low $9.00 after that.

Will you backup my data?

Yes your data is securely stored on our servers and backed up daily.

Am I locked into any contract?

No our service is monthly rolling so you only pay a month at a time. You can cancel your subscription at any time and no further payments will be taken.

Will you help with migration?

If you are considering moving from another provider we can certainly answer any questions you have.

Which browsers are compatible?

Simple. Bouncezap works with all browsers.

Is Bouncezap good for my SEO?

Bouncezap has been produced to increase engagement and conversions rates. Both of these factors are known to be good for Search Engine Optimisation. So, indirectly, yes we would say we can have a positive effect on your SEO.
